desc: Our reusable makeup wipes allow you to remove ALL makeup, including waterproof mascara, quickly with just water. Get glowing skin and never worry about acne again with the Revive Makeup Pad.

layout.text: Thousands Swear Revive Is Their Secret To Glowing Skin
✅ Smoother, softer skin in 30 days or your money back
✅ Remove ALL Makeup, Oil, sweat, and mascara with JUST WATER
✅ Clear up acne and prevent breakouts - even on sensitive skin
✅ Save the environment – each pad replaces 500 wipes
